query.statement:
SELECT A.GDZEINR , A.MATNR , A.MATNR_NM , A.ZSPEC , SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2('KRW',B.SAMT1) AS SAMT1 , A.MATNR_S , A.BIGO , B.DZEINR , SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2('KRW', ( SELECT SAMT1 FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT011 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MATNR = A.MATNR_S ) )AS SAMT2
FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT129 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT011 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.MATNR = B.MATNR WHERE A.MANDT= #G_MANDT# AND A.GDZEINR = #GDZEINR#
ORDER BY MATNR_NM DESC FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
